snippet: At a cemetery in Texas, murderers and other convicts whose bodies are unclaimed can be interred and, for a few moments, remembered.
abstract: Captain Joe Byrd Cemetery in Huntsville, Texas, receives the remains of murderers and other convicts whose bodies go unclaimed; fellow prisoners serve as their gravediggers, and often their sole mourners.
lead_paragraph: At a cemetery in Texas, murderers and other convicts whose bodies are unclaimed can be interred and, for a few moments, remembered.

headline.seo: Texas Prisoner Burials Are a Gentle Touch in a Punitive System
headline.main: Texas Prisoner Burials Are a Gentle Touch in a Punitive System
headline.print_headline: Texas Inmate Rites Are Gentle Touch In Punitive System
